website_summaries.verdict: Sponge-filled and fully adjustable, no-choke harness with handle for medium and large dogs.
pros: Constructed with durable material that will last
Has reliable handle for extra control if needed
cons: Some users report harness rotates sideways when walking
Sizes and fit may be different from chart

customer_reviews.title: Study harness but sizing is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research and purchased this because I love that it easily clips on without the hassle of getting a head or legs through holes. This harness also has the highest reviews at the best price. Harness seems well made but sizing is off so it gets four stars. We followed the size guide and ordered a small for our our pup who is 18'' around her chest and she was swimming in it. Just ordered an xs despite the measurements here indicating it will be too small. These photos are on the smallest setting for the small. Moose is 13 pounds and 18" around her chest. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: bw

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this harness. the 1st one he grew out of. It still looks Brand new. I love this harness so much I had to get it again.
customer_reviews.author: jennifferlo

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally posted one star on this product, and I'm here to clear it up...this is an outstanding harness for our older dog. The handle at the top of the harness is a bonus. This harness takes the pressure of a leash from a dog's neck and distributes it across the chest. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy for a dog to slip out of this harness, use with EXTREME caution, especially if you walk in an urban environment!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst products that we have ever purchased. Our cocker spaniel is a nervous little dog, and in two separate instances, she has backed up against some tension on her leash, and completely slipped out of this harness. We have never had this happen with any other harness with four other dogs. The design is not sufficient, that a dog is prevented from slipping this harness in this common situation. I would give it zero stars, if that was an option...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping to find more reviews about the sizing like this before I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large for my 55lb Australian shepherd, and it is too big. Didn't measure his chest, but his neck is 18". I was hoping to find more reviews about the sizing like this before I ordered, so I hope someone finds review this helpful. With that being said, I will be ordering a medium. It's a great product for walking, and the quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: very displeased
customer_reviews.text: They are TINY and don't follow the size chart at all. PLUS I ordered 2 (blue & red) XS for my 11 pound dog and they are completely different sizes! The blue is 2 inches bigger and fits snug! The red even when adjusted as big as possible doesn't fit the dog at all! I'm returning them both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, Sturdy, Easy On, No Pull Dog Harness
customer_reviews.text: This Copatchy no pull harness is the best ever. It is light weight and sturdy. I have used other harnesses and this one is by far the easiest to snap on! My dog even felt special when we put it on her! And let's not forget Copatchy's incredible customer service! I inadvertently bought the wrong size and they took GREAT care of me!!! I would definitely buy from them again with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: kahogg

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Although I should have ordered a small. This harness is great and my pup has tons of room to grow into. This harness seems to be much more comfortable than other as my dog hasn't chewed this one off. It's very easy to take on and off. I would high recommend. *** and the puppy is buckeled in safety in the pictures ****
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness
customer_reviews.text: This harness is much better than any we've used before. The soft mesh top makes it both easy to put on the right way and is comfortable for our dog. The ring on the top is large and easy to clip the leash to, and the handle has already come in handy. It seems sturdy and fits great (22 lb. Jack Russell, we ordered a small). Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This harness is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 week golden retriever that used to pull as hard as she could on her collar. She doesn't pull at all now. This harness fits perfectly and doesn't rub anywhere. I got a small and it's perfect. When she grows out of this one, I will be buying another just like it. She likes wearing it and she looks so cute! It has a handle on the top so you can guide her or help her get up a step. The price is a nice surprise! It's made really well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerlshrig1

customer_reviews.title: We love this harness
customer_reviews.text: We love this harness. It’s lightweight and easy to put on and off. We had to buy a second one but only bcuz our dog got a hold of it one day and chewed the plastic buckle. That’s on him. This harness is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tosha W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a very hard time fitting our dog with a harness. This one fits great. I had actually gotten two different harnesses with this order. The first I tried, she was mad as a hornet. Hated it. Then I put this one on and she was fine. Ran around like she had no harness on at all. Sleeps in it too. Thanks for making this so flexible!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Griffitts

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: i measured my dog and went a size up because she was borderline. i have it all on the smallest it can go and could have gone a size smaller, but in all i really like this. it looks good and seems solidly made. i like the little handle part at the top in case i need to grab her real quick. she also seems to be comfy in it with no chafing happening
customer_reviews.author: E. merrill

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the xtra small and the small for the same dog. At the largest setting, the x-small didn't fit and the small didn't fit at the smallest setting. We had to duct tape the extra down and make the harness fit proper. It's unfortunate because I love the colors and how well built it is.
customer_reviews.author: JackieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for furry bellies
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well made harness. The only negative was that I had to wait for my miniature schnauzer to grow into it. The description says starting at 7lbs, for her it was actually 10 lbs. But overall a nice harness. Update, I started having trouble putting it on her, she fights me. She accepts other type harnesses. The only thing I can think of is that it pinches her where it clips at the bottom. I've adjusted repeatedly....but she hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Lady

customer_reviews.title: This has been perfect for my 30lb dog
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for my 30lb dog. It seems to be able to adjust the size quite a bit as well, so I bet smaller dogs could fit as well. It is easy to put on my dog and she doesn't seem to mind it at all! Love! And for that price?! Heck yeah. Only thing, it is a lot lighter pink than the picture they show! But thats no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ireland Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Love my Copatchy!
customer_reviews.text: The harness is light, sturdy and breathable with a strong handle on top, which can keep your pup from trouble...The straps and buckles are also top-quality, I found. (Bonus: the blue color is definitely a yes on a black dog! ) One thing to remember is that a Medium size is really a Small...so possibly order one size up than what you normally would or better even, measure your dog :-). A Medium was too small for my big GDS pup.
customer_reviews.author: Emmylou

customer_reviews.title: Best company & great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a less confining harness for my min pins (we recently moved to a warmer climate) that will still keep them safe and came upon the Copatchy. I am very happy with the way these are made & most of all- their support staff!! If you have a question, they are very quick to respond & answer any questions you have! I ordered an X-small for my 11 pound min pin & a small for my 17 pound min pin.
customer_reviews.author: P. Malinowski

customer_reviews.title: Great harness for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best quality harness. Best value. I purchased one almost a year ago for my dachshund pup and he has used it every day. It's still in perfect condition. He's a stocky little guy and pulls very hard on the leash. He gets very excited when it's time to put it on so he wiggles around and this goes on with ease....no pulling over the head, just clips around the body. I've since purchased a second one for my other pup and will purchase a larger one for my stocky guy. I'll be gifting his old one to a friend, because it's still in perfect condition even after daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Harness
customer_reviews.text: This is a great harness. Sturdy and fits well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Clip Broke.  Dog Got Loose.  Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is only 23 lbs, and he managed to break out of this harness without chewing it or hitting it into anything. He was tied up out back on a 25' cable connected to this harness. He was running and when the cable reached its end, the force of that snapped off one of the plastic connectors and the harness flew right off of him. Luckily we were out there with him and quickly got him inside the house. The plastic connectors are not rugged enough. I do not recommend this or any other harness/collar that relies on plastic clips. We will be looking for more durable harnesses and collars going forward.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off, had to order up 1 size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this harness in red. It is very nice and sturdy. It seems to be made well however the sizing is off. Based on the chart I ordered an extra small harness. My dog is a chihuahua/dash hunt mix. It fit him around the chest but it was too tight around his neck and the adjustment was already at the maximum size. I tried to exchange it for the small but Amazon suggested I donate it to someone and they would credit the purchase price regardless and I should just reorder in the next size up. The seller needs to adjust their sizing chart with better measurements besides weight to allow for different dog breeds and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: gayle c hall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this company
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these to start with and then went back and purchased a third. I was looking for harnesses that were difficult for my beagle to get out of because she has been able to get out of everything I have purchased to date. This one fits the bill. The measurements are exactly right on the product description. I had a problem with the third harness not fitting as well as it should but contacted customer service and they went above and beyond to help make things right. Highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: cdvc1216

customer_reviews.title: As described, nice little harness
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this harness. It’s lightweight but seems really sturdy. Our 3 month old golden is already strong, and it’s been perfect on walks. The reflectors showed on a night walk and the little handle on the top is handy to pick a curious puppy up and keep it moving. My only wish is that I had bought it a little bigger. This is the extra small and she’s got about two fingers of room, but the way she’s growing, we’ll need a new one in a week or two. I went according to their recommended sizing and it was true to her weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ella_noe2008

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've seen other dogs wearing Coptachy harnesses and they looked very comfortable in them. The quality was very good and at a really nice price point, so we ordered one for our new pup. We went with a large due to a sizing chart I had seen but it was too big. Contacting Customer Service we were helped by Jared L who went over and above what I was expecting for a solution. We have a Medium replacement on the way (fingers crossed it fits well) and there was absolutely no hassles at all. It was very pleasant working with this company!
customer_reviews.author: tlwink

customer_reviews.title: The fixed angle of the back sets it above alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Most of these dog harnesses, have a loose strap or other highly flexible connection between the front chest strap and the chest strap, allowing the straps to move independently. This often causes the chest strap to shift forward and undercut the front armpits of the dogs front legs, making for a very uncomfortable fit. THIS harness, has a fixed angle on the front vs chest strap, completely alleviating that potential source of irritation. I would suspect this is more of an issue with short hair dogs, as the hair length does nothing to retain the position of the straps, but this one, does not exhibit those shortcomings of alternative harnesses.
customer_reviews.author: K_R_R

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness!!!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY happy with this harness. Will be ordering another one today! Nice looking but feels nice too. Easy to put on and easy to size. Very well made. One of the pups wore it several hours then put it on the other pup. They both ignored it completely. Didn't seem to be uncomfortable in any way. Great product. One pup is 15 weeks and weighs about 25-30 pounds, the other is 10 weeks and weight about 20 pounds. The older is VERY intergetic the smaller is very laid back. First time to have anything on before. Update - So happy with this harness we ordered a second one for our other puppy! Nice product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: STAR STRUCKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this product has such a high rating. It didn’t even last 40 days with our golden retriever puppy. See the attached picture showing the fabric completely ripped. Amazon - please do something about fake reviews or people will start to lose confidence shopping with you.
customer_reviews.author: Puneet Bhatia

customer_reviews.title: Love this harness!
customer_reviews.text: This harness is awesome! It is so quick and simple to put on, and makes walking our 6-month old, 50 pound boxer- mix so much easier! She still pulls and lunges at every squirrel that she sees, but she no longer pulls me off my feet! We've already ordered the same harness in the next size, knowing that she'll soon outgrow the medium harness she's wearing now. The harness is top quality at a very reasonable price. Even after she's trained to walk nicely, we plan to continue using this harness as she appears very comfortable and secure wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: hjkhak

customer_reviews.title: These harnesses never let me down!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, I’ve had dogs of all sizes and these are the harnesses that’s I prefer to use. Traditionally, I’ve always bought harnesses that hug the dog’s chest, but my husband never liked that design and preferred a harness style that fit like a backpack (so to speak). So after doing a bit of searching on Amazon, we came across this brand and we’ve been buying them ever since. This is the 4th harness I’ve bought from this seller. They’re great and they never wear out. I also appreciate the fact that the smaller harnesses come with an extender just in case. As the years go on, I will continue to purchase from this seller. These harnesses are great!
customer_reviews.author: Guy1

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing, poor control
customer_reviews.text: The product size in the description is inaccurate for a small size. It says a small would fit a chest size of 17-22". My dog has a chest of ~18" and the harness doesn't fit, even if I adjust it to as small as I can. I measured the harness myself and found that at its smallest it is still >18". Moreover, there is no piece connecting the two loops around the chest and neck like other harnesses. This means that the harness easily slides to the sides and makes it awkward to control the dog or for them to move comfortably. How this harness has rave reviews is beyond me..
customer_reviews.author: Brett Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it fits because its costs $5.00 or more to return it!!!
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated! I bought 2 for my new puppy because I didn't have him yet and needed a harness when I picked him up from the rescue. Now I'm trying to return the one that was too small and I have to pay $5+ for the return or drive into downtown Seattle, 45 minutes away to return it for free. Do not buy this because if it doesn't fit you might as well keep it due to the high return fees!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beagles!
customer_reviews.text: Only harness I’ve found that fits my weird shaped beagle! She is a dork and not only pulls on the leash my (which this handles fine) but sometimes I have to pull HER, and in other harnesses I have had, it would slip over her head. This has an adjustable neck band so that doesn’t happen. I got a medium and she is about 25lbs, with a wide chest and skinny neck. probably could have gone for a large as I have it pretty wide set, but it seems to fit her well without being too tight. Also a way better price than any harnesses I have found at pet stores. Well made, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured, but great
customer_reviews.text: It's likely because I ordered an XXS for my little 3 lb. puppy, but I didn't get what was in the pictures. That said, I love it anyway! This harness is sturdy without being heavy, and actually adjusts down to REALLY FIT my little Ginger! I've been to numerous pet supply stores and even boutiques (gag), and no one had a harness that was small enough. She can't wriggle out of it, and she can't get her lower jaw stuck in it either, yet it's light and comfortable. It arrived today (2 days earlier than the estimate), and she's wearing it now...fast asleep!
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great for Basset Hounds!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this harness for my basset hound. Have been having a heck of a time finding a harness that fits him, he doesn’t mind wearing, and is easy to put on. This one has it all! I’d say this is a lighter weight harness. The o ring to attach the leash too is metal and sturdy enough for my guy who isn’t to rambunctious while on walks. This harness also has little reflective strips in it for safety while walking in dim light. I ordered the Medium for my 4.5month old basset puppy and he currently weighs 32 lbs. it is tightened to its tightest settings and is a perfect fit. Lots of room for him to grow into.
customer_reviews.author: bdble

customer_reviews.title: This is a great harness! I bought two
customer_reviews.text: This is a great harness! I bought two.. an extra small for my 7lb Cocapoo and a small formu 18lb Havanese and they fit perfectly! I have had the worst time trying to find one to fit correctly for my Cocapoo, I was thrilled when this one fit so well. They are well made and it works easily to go from taking a walk to clicking them in the backseat of the car with the dog seatbelt. Highly recommend these harnesses!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Y Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Size Chart
customer_reviews.text: The size chart says that a small harness fits 17-22 inch chest. I measured my dog's chest as 18 inches, but this harness is HUGE on her. I have adjusted it to its tightest setting, and it will do for now, but if she had a 17" chest this would be inappropriate for her size. I can fit at least two hands between the strap and her body with room to spare. It does seem comfortable for her but because it is too large it kind of swivels to the side a lot. I would suggest if your dog is falling on the lower end of the size chart to get the next size down.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I never tried this brand of Harness before. But I liked the look and features and decided to give it a try. Used sizing guidelines, and the harness fit was perfect. Able to be adjusted a bit smaller or larger if needed. When adjusting the straps, they so far have stayed right where adjusted. Love how the harness snaps around neck and waist, so is fast and easy to put on. And looks good on my dog, and functions great (wear and walking). The construction appears very durable and well made, and considering buying a second. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The best but check the size carefully before ordering.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this vest for both of her fur babies and I loved it. Based on her dogs I ordered an xsmall for my pup, which was too small, couldn't return as I destroyed the packaging opening it up (company says has to return in original packaging and this was taped so much it was impossible to open cleanly.) Soooo ... Ordered the next size up and fits perfectly. Comfortable and easy to put on. I especially like the hand hold at the back and ring for the lead. Easy to put on and no binding at the front legs. Still giving it 5 stars because this absolutely the best we have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: pbaden

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a harness that would eliminate choking my 12 year old terrier. I never stopped her from pulling. I had a step in harness which she resisted stepping in to. I also had trouble keeping it from twisting between uses. This harness is j-u-s-t right!. No push back from her and she seems to like it and I feel better about not crushing her throat. Very easy to put on her. I leave the front latches attached and only have to snap the underside straps in place. Easy. It is not heavy, chaffing or ugly! Very happy. I found it by looking and looking at possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Deb

customer_reviews.title: Size up if your pup is in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that this is a very nice harness. It's softly padded and super easy to get on. I measured my dog beforehand and he fell in between a medium and large. I ordered the medium thinking the large would be too big. Unfortunately, it didn't for his chest even though the neck was perfect. But thankfully, Copatchy's customer service is fantastic and they exchanged it for me! The low price, the high quality and the fact that they stand behind the product makes it an easy decision. Buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: PennyPenny

customer_reviews.title: Reputable seller....backs their products!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an X-Small for my 15 pound schnauzer mix. The neck part of the harness fit fine, but the part that went across her chest was a little too short. I contacted the seller via e-mail and requested to exchange the X-Small to a Small. Jared got back to me right away and said he would be sending me replacement free of charge. I love doing business with a company that stands by their products, and this one does. Thanks Copatchy! The harness is nicely made and the Small version should fit my dog well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.  I love this harness.
customer_reviews.text: This harness is so well made. Very easy to make on and off...comfortable on the dog. I first ordered a small for my 15 pound SHIPOO and it was actually too large. I was afraid the dog could come out of it. I contacted customer service...wonderful service ..and they sent me the extra small which is snug at the collar but not too tight. I am so happy to have this....the one I have been using for several years was great, but the clasp was so difficult to open at times....occasionally I'd have to leave i on and come back later to remove it. This caress is very secure but easy to open. i highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: gretchen craig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I have a 32 pound border doodle puppy. I ordered a small because of the amount of reviews noting size problems. It fits pretty well. I would have ordered a medium had I ordered the size based on the chart. Glad I went down a size. Will order a new one when he grows out of this, which is inevitable. He still pulls some but not as much as he did with the other harness. It is lightweight so he doesn't seem to mind it being left on all day hanging out at home. Seems like it would dry fairly quickly if your pup went swimming in it. Will update when we have a chance to test this theory.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Behm

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/off
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on and take off. No more sliding a harness over my pups head. My pup is a large breed puppy and is still growing and learning. I bought a medium knowing it would be a little large now, but in a few weeks would be fitting perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ElgynSpyder

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for a small dog harness that is easy to apply and not cost a fortune. I am fostering a little 9lb mix and purchased at a local store, trying to buy local, a harness and it fit her terrible but due to covid I purchased it. I hate that most small dog harnesses you have to put the feet in first. So I saw this harness and liked just the one strap application after the neck part is fitted. Well made, love the handle on the back. I will have to keep this brand in mind for other fosters that come our way.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Schupp

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on time and as described
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 yrs old shichon weight about 12 lbs with the chest size 16" in without the fur (lol) and neck size is about 11". I ordered a xs size and it seems to fit. Hope this one will reduce the choking potential as the traditional collar. The package also come with a 1.5 in extender, which is nice, in case you need it. The strap is soft and I think it will work. I am giving it a 4 star because the product is exactly what it described in the ad. Will take my dog out and try out this new collar. Will change the rating if it does not work out.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Puppy can wear it all day
customer_reviews.text: The perfect puppy harness! We've have this pup home for only 4 weeks and already ditched the previous harness with too many straps and big plastic clips. This one is much easier on and off and more comfy for little Jucille. She can nap just fine with it on. It has one clip on top out of the way for comfort. When she's wearing the camo version she can hardly be seen in the wild. :^) I wish it had a chest ring which is more helpful to training her not to pull. As she grows I will order the next size up, being so inexpensive that won't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Debrina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pit Bull and a Boston Terrier, totally different body builds, however this harness fits them both wonderfully! My Pit is built like a barrel so getting a harness that fit both his neck and his chest was difficult. Neither dog minds wearing them, in fact they sit nicely to have them put on to go for a walk or a ride in the car. The material is of good quality and the buckles are stout. This works well with the BWOGUE seat belt for dogs too. Below is the link:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and seller.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these harnesses. The first time I bought one I got it for my Pomeranian and the second one I purchased was for my senior Dachshund. The most recent one that I ordered didn't fit him correctly, but the seller was very generous and offered to send the correct size at no charge. If at any point in the future I need another harness this will be the only place that I purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Great harness!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10 week old who is just about to ready for next size up. Material is very good and no issues with it degrading or tearing. Very easy to adjust the straps and I like the easy leash connect. My dog knows when I put this harness on, it's going for a longer walk. Harness allows for more humane control of my puppy without chocking her. My puppy likes to run, especially when squirrels or birds are nearby. This harness allows me to control her when she has the urge to take off. I plan on buying the larger version soon. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Above Avg Techie

customer_reviews.title: Extra Small fits my pudgy Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: This harness works great for my pudgy Chihuahua. It holds him securely and so far he hasn't escaped from it. It's been especially good for the excessive humidity of Summer. I only have one complaint and that is it rubs under his front legs and I noticed redness where it rubs him. I hope adjusting the harness to where it will be farther back from his legs will help with that. If not I will donate it and have to start looking for another harness. It is hard to find a good harness for small dogs so I hope I can get it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: SEC

customer_reviews.title: Sizing ratio beyond weird
customer_reviews.text: This is a great harness, I just wish the sizing was a little more realistic. I sized for the neck because that's what was recommended in several questions and reviews, but the girth is already almost maxed. We have a 4 month blue heeler with a very balanced build, and the chest strap is at its minimum while the girth is at its max. Hopefully we can get this to last long enough to be worth it. Other than the weird, imbalanced sizing, it's a comfortable and easy to use harness. I really like the "handle".
customer_reviews.author: burgi

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppy
customer_reviews.text: I tried this out on my puppy and what a difference it's made!! He doesn't pull and he can't bite the leash anymore. Seems very comfortable for him. It's helped so much with training. Also, the handle is handy for his little self. He was 17lbs when I first put it on him (I bought a small) and he has room to grow in it. I'll eventually buy the med. too since it's working for him! Very well made, sturdy harness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a home dog boarder, so I work with a LOT of different types of collars, leashes, harnesses, etc. One of my clients brought a pup wearing his harness and I was very impressed with its ease, comfort, and design. I purchased one for my puppy. Unfortunately, I ordered a size too large. The seller contacted me with a customer service followup and I told them that I had purchased the incorrect size. Within days, I had a new harness in a smaller size and a note asking that I donate the other harness to an animal shelter. I was already impressed with the product, now I'm in love with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dream Workz

customer_reviews.title: extra small will not fit a Peke
customer_reviews.text: Based on some comments here I tried extra small for my 13 lb Pekinese. It was absurdly small for him. I guess I am just going to eat the cost and see if I can give it away to someone else with a smallish chihuahua sized dog. I do not plan on trying a bigger size because the minimalist design does not appear to really distribute stress away from the collar. Take some of these very positive reviews with a grain of salt.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We just got a shelter dog, and had no harness, so I ordered this one. We love it, and especially love the handle. It comes in really handy and not something I would have thought of. The harness is adjustable so even if your measurements are a little off like mine were, you can adjust it to fit. Artie the wonder dog loves it, and I feel good knowing I am not pulling at his neck all the time. We got the lime green one, as she is dark black brown, and we thought if she ever got loose we could see her.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I ordered these harnesses for my three dogs. I eyed these up for months before I finally bought them. The reviews about sizing made me hesitate. Definitely measure your dog and read reviews before you choose a size. I found that my dogs were all between sizes. I read reviews saying that the neck ran big so I sized down for all three of my dogs. All three harnesses fit perfect and seem to be really great quality. For reference here’s what I ordered- - 50 lb. blue heeler (size medium) - 55 lb. blue heeler (size medium) - 22 lb. weiner dog/Boston terrier (size small)
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is weird, but quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: The price is great for these and so is the quality. I dinged it one start for the sizing, which is a little screwy. There's a 'gap' between the x-small and small sizes, so it's possible that neither will fit your dog. The X-Small just fits our 13-pounder. We bought the next size up for our 14-pound MaltiChon and we couldn't make it fit. For the price and quality, I fixed it with an Xacto knife and some nylon thread. If you don't know how to do that, take the time and teach yourself a life skill. .
customer_reviews.author: Virgil

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with purchase. My dog's neck was slightly larger than the measurements for the extra small so I got the small. The collar stretches a bit so the extra small would have been a better fit. Would buy again. Durable and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually reloctant to write reviews, but in the case of Copatchy it is a pleasure. I purchased a (No Pull Reflective Adjustable Dog Harness with Handle). The product arrived on time and is well worth the money. This harness was a little big for my dog, so I sent a message to Copatchy informing them of my problem. Their response took me back. I have never been treated so fairly by any company in the past. Copatchy apologized for my problem then set out correct it. I have nothing but high praise for this company. Oh, and did I say, the product was of good quality?
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get off and on.
customer_reviews.text: We love this new harness. We bought a XS for our 13 1/2 pound Maltipoo, Bella. With some normal adjustments, it fits her perfectly. If she was any bigger, I believe this size would have been a bit too small. We like the fact we don't have to stick her legs through anything and all that. This harness is very easy to use and she doesn't seem to mind it at all. So far, it's been a Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: great harness
customer_reviews.text: we have a 19lb almost 3mo old shepard mix and with only minor adjustments, this harness works great! A bit large across her chest but she'll grow into it in a few weeks. Easy on and off!! great price too-better than at the stores
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you need/want
customer_reviews.text: I’ve given it a 4/5 because my dog was still able to slide out. It’s definitely tougher to get out than any others I’ve had which is better but still not what I wanted. My dog is very hyper and charges at people to play and it can come across aggressive. I I do feel like I have more control over here. The thing is huge. Not sure how to explain this part well but the nickel is huge it’s a bit heavier than most harnesses. It’s still good to know I have more control.
customer_reviews.author: edwin enrique laguan trejo

customer_reviews.title: Great for growing puppy
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good starter harness for my golden retriever puppy. The small was a little too big on him from 8-11 weeks (we used it anyway with no problems) but he's now about 20 pounds and it fits him well. I love how much room there is to adjust the straps, I think this should fit him well for at least another 4-6 weeks. I don't know why this claims to discourage pulling. He hasn't been too bad yet so it's not a problem, but if you are specifically looking for a harness that discourages pulling I'd recommend one with a front D-ring attachment instead of this so when your dog pulls forward the leash turns him around.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: still pulling but...
customer_reviews.text: I have two shih tzu mix dogs and bought these to eliminate the pulling. However, they still pull. But one other reason I purchased these was to securely hold these dogs. They are escape artists and wiggle out of any harness I've tried. These harnesses do hold the dogs and I dont worry that they'll back out and run. Believe me, they've tried. So worthwhile even if the dogs still pull - at least I wont have to worry about losing them again.
customer_reviews.author: blingviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! One of our foster dogs is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great product! One of our foster dogs is a giant muscle on legs, and one morning he practically pulled my arm out of its socket trying to chase a squirrel. I was completely airborne until I clunked to the ground, twisting my back and bruising my ego (of course there were witnesses-of course). Plus when he pulled when sporting a conventional collar, he wheezed and choked and hacked in a most disturbing way. I marched my happy self right home and ordered this halter, then sat by the mailbox waiting for it arrive. The medium is a perfect fit, the dog and I keep "six on the ground," and it has made a tremendous difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DeLong-White

customer_reviews.title: A great simple harness for a puppy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great simple harness that's very easy to install on a wiggling 5 month old puppy. Two adjustment points and two thick plastic buckles and you're done. It's mesh, so it's pretty breathable. My puppy loves to swim in creeks and lakes and I leave her harness on so I can grab on to the handle and help her get across or back on land when she gets tired. For reference: puppy is 5 months, 30-35 lbs and is built like a hunting hound with deep ribs and chest, but slim half end. Measurements are 14 inch neck, 16 chest, and 18 inches tall at the shoulders. The small size fits with a little room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Harness
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent harness. It is very easy to attach, and the XS fits my 13lb Shih Tzu perfectly. And it is apparently comfortable enough that our dog Leo can wear it around the house for hours after a walk and he hardly seems to know it's there. The materials used are quality, rugged, and the craftsmanship seems great as well. All in all, this harness is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: IAMSLICK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Company 5++++++
customer_reviews.text: The item runs large but very sturdy. I ordered a small for my Dashund, Yorkshire Terrier and Chihuahua rescue who is about 11 lbs with a odd shape. I reached out to the company Copatchy and got a response from Jared who was going to send me another one and told me to donate the one I have to the local shelter. What a wonderful individual and company. I recommend this company and will refer my friends to the site that have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie53

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit and cannot return
customer_reviews.text: The product does not fit my dog. The front strap goes right on his neck instead of his shoulder. I have a small 13 pound dog and got the XS. The size is right but the front portion goes on his neck and exerts pressure while walking. This seller does NOT ACCEPT RETURNS. Dude - Seller - Make that return policy in BOLD letters. you are an outlier on Amazon for not accepting returns. Thank god it was not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: dkotagi

customer_reviews.title: Small dog harness
customer_reviews.text: I really like this harness for my little rat terrier. He weighs 20 lbs. and this is heavier that his previous harness, but this one has a huge advantage in that I don't have to lift his front feet into the leg holes while he is smartly trying to to dance them out. Very frustrating. He has such a small head that I can't just snap a leash onto his collar. He pulls it right off. Apparently his head is smaller than the circumference of his neck.
customer_reviews.author: restongirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice harness and we have been able to shorten the straps down so it can fit an 8-9 week old puppy. However, the cons we have found is while the straps can all be shortened they won’t stay shortened so there is not enough traction or teeth in the plastic to keep straps from loosening up. Also where the handle is on the top of the harness we noticed our puppy constantly scratches and it due to the metal links that dig into the dog from the underside even though there is cloth covering the metal, you can feel it pushing through the cloth and it is hitting up against the dogs back.
customer_reviews.author: RStoltzfoos

customer_reviews.title: There is a size gap. The XS was too ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a size gap. The XS was too small for my dog on its largest setting, and the S is too big for my dog on the smallest setting. Also, the XS and S were ordered from the same Amazon page (just selected different sizes) but they are not even the exact same harness - one has the Copatchy logo and the other has no logo.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: The Fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look of this harness; however, the fit was a bit off although I got the extra small. To be fair my dog is a small Chi (short haired), under 10 lbs and finding a harness that fits well is a bit tricky. I played around with it a bit and adjusted the part that goes around his chest, so that it looks like a U and that seems to help for the moment. I would attach a pic if I were able to at the time of this review. I'll see how it does during cold weather when my dog has a layer on.
customer_reviews.author: Bella4ever

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: So, my extremely rowdy dog DID wiggle out of this ONE time but that's because we were holding her by it vertically and she slipped out to chase another dog. That being said, if your NORMAL dog wears it it's a comfortable fit and an effective harness. We bought this one when she grew out of her puppy harness and although she might need a bit more of a straitjacket, this harness is comfortable for her and has served us well on many a walk.
customer_reviews.author: castmember19

customer_reviews.title: After some modifications my dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn't like the excess stuff . I removed the handle and modified the snaps on the side so they didn't stick in his side . Months ago I bought one of those Pug Harnesses . It was so heavy and restrictive he wouldn't move after I put it on him not to mention the $39 price tag . I was very happy to find this harness and so is my dog > Its easy to put on and take off , but watch the clips on the side you can get pinched and it hurts .
customer_reviews.author: Rodmiami

customer_reviews.title: Great for leash training my puppy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to leash train my puppy. The leash attaches to the top between the dog’s shoulder blades so it is easy to keep the leash out of the way and prevent another distraction. It is definitely safer since my puppy likes to pull and it allows me to pull him back and keep him at my side without putting pressure on my puppy’s neck. I plan on buying the larger version when he grown out of the medium because I like this so much.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Forseth

customer_reviews.title: Runs big but very nice harness
customer_reviews.text: I bought two or these for my dogs, a small and a medium. I believe I measured correctly but they are both too big. So i have my medium dog wearing the small and my small the dog is going to receive an extra small from the company free of charge. I will donate the medium harness to my local shelter as requested by the company and I was also impressed by their thoughtfulness. Great customer service and very nice secure and comfortable product!
customer_reviews.author: adoptdogsforlife

customer_reviews.title: Generous company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it was a bit big on my dog even though she fit the deminsions of the sizing chart. I contacted Copatchy like the card said that came with it and they got back to me right away, and offered to replace with a smaller one, and only asked that I donate the bigger one to an animal shelter to help pups in need, they were so generous, that the next time I need a harness I will get from them. A company that helps shelters like this and is generous with their customers is awesome my book. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Good quaity
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this seems like a good quality harness. We've only used it for two days, but the clips on the straps are sturdy, adjusting the size is easy, and the handle/leash clip is firmly attached. My puppy seemed to scratch a LOT while it was on, though, so I'm not sure how comfortable it is for him. Once I took it off, the scratching stopped, but I'm guessing he just needs to get used to it. We'll continue using it until we need to upgrade the size.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity McC

customer_reviews.title: Like the harness, but had the same size problem as most
customer_reviews.text: I like this harness for my Chihuahua/Jack Russell, but I had the same exact problem as most everybody else! The fit. One good thing he isn't the type to try to get out of it and sneak away like our pit has. She would never be able to use this type of harness! It is too big even at it's tightest. The difference in the sizing is the problem. The smaller one would of been way too tight! We're keeping this even though it is so loose because he won't try to slip out of it. It is a softer harness and seems comfortable for him. Other than size issue, it's not a bad harness.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Cute harness, great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent harness and great customer support. We has originally purchased a medium harness for our puppy based on chest girth measurement. When we received it and realized our pup was swimming in it, we contacted the business and received very helpful guidance - and were sent a small size at no additional cost. The small size works great! FYI- we use the harness with our car safety belt, but can't rate on walk impact/effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A

customer_reviews.title: Finally a perfect soft harness!
customer_reviews.text: My search for the perfect harness is over! My pup is short with a broad chest. He is quite the puller on walks and has to have a harness. I leave it on during the day for the dog walker. It has been difficult to find one that fits his body shape, and the only one I found so far was very stiff. This harness fits perfectly thanks to the adjustable neck and chest- and is a very soft, breathable design. It has held up very well for us. My dog is around 23 pounds and the size small fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Emo79

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but I ordered a small which was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I ordered a small which was slightly big on my 23 pound pit/terrier (he's pretty lean). He managed to take it off while in his crate, chew the fabric and consume one of the hard plastic buckles. Just as a forewarning, if the harness has room to spare, do not leave your dog alone in a crate with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C

customer_reviews.title: Answer to my harness prayers
customer_reviews.text: My Missy is a dachshund/terrier mix with a slender neck and broad chest. Have been unable to find a harness that fits. UNTIL I came across Copatchy on Amazon. The reviews encouraged me so I ordered it, and Missy and I are very happy. It fits beautifully, was easily adjusted where necessary, and she happily prances around during her walk. She stands patiently while I fasten it and is in no hurry to have it removed. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kukla

customer_reviews.title: First harness mini-dachshund puppy hasn't chewed through
customer_reviews.text: Four harnesses in four months - until this one which has lasted 2 months and going strong. It fits well around her barrel dachshund chest and adjusts better than any of the others we've tried. With the chest and under-belly adjustment, she doesn't get her lower jaw caught underneath the webbing, so isn't chewing it. It also has the connectors in a comfortable location that doesn't rub sores under her arm. There's several inches of adjustment left if needed.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I confused this with the type of harness that actually prevents a dog from pulling - despite being called "no pull" this harness does nothing to redirect (and therefore prevent) pulling. Instead of this harness, buy one that connects to the front of the harness (chest area) to prevent pulling.
customer_reviews.author: KLBowen

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I have a chihuahua/papillon mix that can get out of everything. This is the 4th different style of harness I've tried on him in the 2 months since I adopted him and so far he hasn't been able to back out of it. It's really easy to put on and he doesn't seem to mind having it put on (he hated putting on his last one). I also really like the handle on the back for more control. The only thing I've noticed is that it slides a little to the sides if he pulls, but it doesn't seem to bother him or become uncomfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made to last, even with "pullers"!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Medium Dog Harness and Leash Set - StrawberryEC Adjustable No Pull Dog Harness With Handle Sold by: StrawberryEC . Our golden retriever puppy broke the plastic clips within 2 weeks. The second she chewed but wore until the metal ring (for the lead connector) broke. (3 mos) This one has bee a dream so far!
customer_reviews.author: theplanna

customer_reviews.title: Decent harness but bad sizing
customer_reviews.text: I have two 10-month-old pugs. I measured them and ordered the size SMALL but they were way too large. So I returned them and ordered a size XS, as shown in the pictures. The XS harnesses are very tight. But, they do securely hold my pugs. With my other harnesses, my pugs sometimes back-out of them and get loose. So, I feel more secure, walking my pugs with this harness, but I fear they will out-grow them in a few months and the next size up (small) may still be too large.
customer_reviews.author: KJP

customer_reviews.title: There is a small loop on the back of the harness that works great in order to train our pup to walk along ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want an effortless, effective harness, stop looking! This is one of the most functional harness on the market! I have a Siberian Husky/Retriever mix and he is quite strong. I got the medium and he is about 45-50pnds. It fits perfectly! I only put this on him to take him out, therefore, I leave the chest strapped locked and only release below the belly. He loves it! There is a small loop on the back of the harness that works great in order to train our pup to walk along side us instead of pulling. I will continue to buy again from CoPatchy
customer_reviews.author: marisa ketzeback

customer_reviews.title: Not living up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my dog based on all the reviews but the quality did not seem to live up to my expectations. I did measure my dogs neck and girth and even after that the sizing of the harness was off. Which I was disappointing. It was lose on my pup Jake. The harness did not have enough strap to make it tight enough and would slide side to slide on his body. I got a smaller size too and That was still too big for a dog that is considered 17 pounds and is a terrier mix
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sarge loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog has never liked a harness before until this one. It's lighter weight and easier to put on him. It fits him perfectly. I'm ordering two more today because I never want to be without one. Seriously, I really like this harness.
customer_reviews.author: merrywv

customer_reviews.title: A great harness, easy to put on and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd harness I have tried for my Dachshund. This one is great. It is easy to put on, lightweight and comfortable looking. The strap that goes under the dogs head in front sits high enough that my dog can't get her paws over it as she did with another type harness. Both front and back straps are adjustable. Some harnesses of this type have adjustment straps on the back only which made it unusable for my dog because of her short legs.
customer_reviews.author: GreenHeron

customer_reviews.title: Love this Harness and Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Bought XS for JRT as reviews said harness' come big but it was too small. Seller responded quickly & shipped S at no charge. Great customer service!, went above & beyond! The S arrived quickly $ fits perfectly. I love how easy it is to take on and off. Seems comfortable for my dog. Extremely happy with my purchase. Will definitely purchase again for our other dog and wil reccommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Harness!
customer_reviews.text: I read what other reviews said about size running small, so did the measurements and ordered the X-Small. It fit my 12 lb. Morkie perfectly right out of the package! It's very easy to put on and take off, which was a problem I had with other harnesses - trying to figure out which way to put them on and trying to get her legs into the leg holes. Just slip it over her head and buckle it underneath her chest - easy! So far, I am very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: pattilee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, high quality and Easy to Fit
customer_reviews.text: Rarely have I found a harness so light weight, well made and easy to put on. I give this harness a five star rating for these reasons. I will continue to use this harness even though my pet beagle was able to back out of the harness very easily the first time. EVERY harness I have tried, he has been able to do this It just means I have to be more vigilant when we are out walking.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Great Puppy Harness
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this harness, sturdy, pretty blue, easy to put on. The handle on the top is an added plus when pup is learning to climb into the car, handy to give a little boost! My lab is 5 months and I think I may have another month's month worth of wear. I do wish it had the ring on the front for hooking the leash onto as I find that works for pullers. But overall great harness!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mcintire

customer_reviews.title: Small is BIG DOG small.  Not little dog small
customer_reviews.text: It looks absolutely perfect if it fit my dog. I have a 10 pound mix and I bought the small. I could fit 2 of her in it. Maybe a 4-5 month old Labrador puppy could fit in a small. But a Chihuahua type or Maltese type is out of the question for this product Very Bummed because it seems well thought out and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lou.

product_meta.title: Copatchy No Pull Reflective Adjustable Dog Harness with Handle
feature_bullets: Medium Size,Chest Size: 21-25 Inches Neck Size: 17-19.5 Inches Weight 42-58 LBS Please Note that Weights and Measurements are Approximate. If you are Unsure of the Size You Need Please Contact Us and We Will Be Happy to Help.

COMFORTABLE SPONGE FILLED ANTI PULL effect dog harness for your best friend: no stress on dog's neck, no choke, ideal solution for dogs that pull with sponge filling comfortable and luxurious, perfectly designed for easy walking, jogging, running, hiking or even training
Clips Around Both Your Pets Neck and Chest Allowing for The Harness To Be Both Easily Applied and Taken Off With ease
Made with High quality breathable mesh material to keep your loving pet nic e and cool while keeping you in total control, dog harness with handle , dog harness and leash set
The Extra Handle on Top of This Harness Makes it Easier to Control and Walk Hard Pulling and Elderly Dogs , dog harness adjustable , dog harness
